TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapAttributes extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示特性对象的集合，这些对象控制 如何序列化和反序列化 SOAP 方法。

span.span: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the serializes and deserializes SOAP methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 是替代 序列化类实例的默认方式的过程的一部分。Creating a is part of a process that overrides the default way the serializes class instances. 例如，假设您想要序列化从具有无法访问的源的 DLL 创建的对象。For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL that has an inaccessible source. 通过使用 类，您可以增加或控制序列化对象的方式。By using the class, you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized. 类的成员 直接对应于控制序列化的特性类的系列。The members of the class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization. 例如，必须将 属性设置为 ，这允许您通过指示将 属性值序列化为编码的 SOAP 特性来重写字段或属性的序列化。For example, the property must be set to a , which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the to serialize the property value as an encoded SOAP attribute. 有关控制编码的 SOAP 序列化的属性的完整列表，请参阅 [控制编码的 Soap 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization)。For a complete list of attributes that control encoded SOAP serialization, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization). 有关将类的实例添加到类的实例的更多详细信息 ，请参阅 类概述。For more details about adding an instance of the class to an instance of the class, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Group` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. `GroupName`重写和字段的序列化 `IgnoreThis` 和枚举的成员 `GroupType` 。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在方法中， `CreateOverrideSerializer` 创建一个，对于每个重写的成员或枚举，将 使用适当的属性集创建，并将其添加到中 。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 是使用创建的 ，并且 用于创建 重写默认序列化的。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要重写其序列化的每个成员或类实例，你必须创建一个新的 。For each member or class instance whose serialization is being overridden, you must create a new . 根据需要将的属性设置为 适当的，然后将添加 到类的实例 。Set the properties for the as appropriate to the member or object, then add the to an instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Group` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. `GroupName`重写和字段的序列化 `IgnoreThis` 和枚举的成员 `GroupType` 。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在方法中， `CreateOverrideSerializer` 创建一个，对于每个重写的成员或枚举，将 使用适当的属性集创建，并将其添加到中 。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 是使用创建的 ，并且 用于创建 重写默认序列化的。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，如果没有属性应用于公共字段或公共读/写属性，则会将其序列化为 XML 元素。By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element. 还可以 通过 将应用于字段或属性，指示将成员序列化为编码的 SOAP XML 特性。You can also instruct the to serialize a member as an encoded SOAP XML attribute by applying a to the field or property. ( 必须使用创建，以便 将对象序列化为编码的 SOAP XML 流。 ) (The must be created with an in order to serialize an object as an encoded SOAP XML stream.) 属性允许您通过将应用到成员来重写控制的序列化 。The property allows you to override the serialization controlled by applying a to the member. 有关此过程的更多详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more details on this process, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Group` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. `GroupName`重写和字段的序列化 `IgnoreThis` 和枚举的成员 `GroupType` 。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在方法中， `CreateOverrideSerializer` 创建一个，对于每个重写的成员或枚举，将 使用适当的属性集创建，并将其添加到中 。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 是使用创建的 ，并且 用于创建 重写默认序列化的。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 元素或属性的默认值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.

value.span: 表示 XML 元素或特性的默认值的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过将属性应用到成员来设置成员的默认值 。The default value of a member can be set by applying a attribute to the member. 如果将成员序列化为编码的 SOAP 消息，则可以通过创建一个新的 ，设置其 属性，并将 属性设置为对象来更改默认值。If the member is being serialized as an encoded SOAP message, you can change the default value by creating a new , setting its property, and setting the property to the object. 将添加 到 。Add the to a . 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more details, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名为 `Group` 的类，其中包含一个名为的字段 `GroupName` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that includes a field named `GroupName`. 默认值设置 为 ".net"。The default value is set with the to ".NET". 如果未设置字段或将其设置为 ".NET"，则不会序列化该值 (因为默认值已) 。By either not setting the field, or by setting it to ".NET", the value is not serialized (because the default value is already known). 该示例还重写方法中的默认值，该方法由 `CreateOverrideSerializer` 方法调用 `SerializeOverride` 。The sample also overrides the default value in the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, which is called by the `SerializeOverride` method. 该示例调用这两个方法 `SerializeOriginal` 和 `SerializeOverride` ，并为字段设置与 ".net" ) ( 相同的值 `GroupName` 。The example calls both methods, `SerializeOriginal` and `SerializeOverride`, and sets the same value (".NET") for the `GroupName` field. 由于重写，仅在调用方法时才会序列化该值 `SerializeOverride` 。Because of the override, the value is serialized only when calling the `SerializeOverride` method. [!code-cpp[SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue/CPP/defvalue.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue/CS/defvalue.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue/VB/defvalue.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于控制将类成员序列化为 XML 元素的。The is used to control the serialization of a class member as an XML element. 通过创建新的并将其分配给属性，将属性设置为新的 ，以覆盖作为 XML 元素的类成员的序列化 。Set the property to a new to override the serialization of a class member as an XML element by creating a new and assigning it to the property. 然后，将添加 到 。Then add the to a . 使用创建 ，然后 使用构造 。Create an with the , then construct an with the . 有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Transportation` 。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation`. 字段的序列化 `Vehicle` 被重写。The serialization of the `Vehicle` field is overridden. 在方法中， `CreateOverrideSerializer` 创建一个，对于每个重写的成员或枚举，将 使用适当的属性集创建，并将其添加到中 。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 是使用创建的 ，并且 用于创建 重写默认序列化的。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 如何序列化 SOAP 枚举。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a SOAP enumeration.

value.span: 一个对象，指定 如何序列化一个枚举成员。

span.span: An object that specifies how the serializes an enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于控制枚举成员的序列化。The is used to control the serialization of an enumeration member. 将 属性设置为新的 ，以重写此类成员的序列化。Set the property to a new to override the serialization of such a member. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化两个名为 `Food` 和 `FoodType` 的类。The following example serializes two classes named `Food` and `FoodType`. `FoodType`类包含两个被重写的枚举，而对于每个枚举，该示例创建一个 分配给的 属性的 。The `FoodType` class contains two enumerations that are overridden, and for each enumeration, the example creates a that it assigns to the property of a . 然后，该示例将添加 到 用于创建的 。The example then adds the to a , which is used to create an . summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 是否将公共字段或属性序列化为经过编码的 SOAP XML。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the serializes a public field or property as encoded SOAP XML.

value.span: 如果 不得序列化字段或属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，会通过序列化所有公共字段和公共读/写属性 。By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the . 也就是说，每个公共字段或属性的值将作为 xml 元素或 xml 文档中的 xml 特性保存。That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML document. 若要重写字段或属性的默认序列化，请创建一个 ，并将其 属性设置为 `true` 。To override the default serialization of a field or property, create a , and set its property to `true`. 使用 方法将对象添加到 ，并指定包含要忽略的字段或属性的对象的类型，以及要忽略的字段或属性的名称。Use the method to add the object to a and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore and the name of the field or property to ignore. 如果对某个 字段或属性应用了，则忽略该字段或属性。If a is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored. 不过，您可以通过创建 ，将其 属性设置为 `false` ，并将其添加到来重写此行为 ，同时指定包含字段或属性的对象的类型以及字段或属性的名称。However you can override that behavior by creating a , setting its property to `false`, and adding it to a , specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property and the name of the field or property. ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Group` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. `GroupName`重写和字段的序列化 `IgnoreThis` 和枚举的成员 `GroupType` 。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在方法中， `CreateOverrideSerializer` 创建一个，对于每个重写的成员或枚举，将 使用适当的属性集创建，并将其添加到中 。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 是使用创建的 ，并且 用于创建 重写默认序列化的。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于控制生成的 XML 流 。The can be used to control the XML stream generated by the . 将 属性设置为新的 ，以控制序列化类时生成的 XML 的架构。Set the property to a new to control the schema for the XML that is generated when a class is serialized. ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Group` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. `GroupName`重写和字段的序列化 `IgnoreThis` 和枚举的成员 `GroupType` 。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在方法中， `CreateOverrideSerializer` 创建一个，对于每个重写的成员或枚举，将 使用适当的属性集创建，并将其添加到中 。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 是使用创建的 ，并且 用于创建 重写默认序列化的。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]
